CONNECTED_IN_DIAGNOSTIC_MODE: You are connected in diagnostic mode.
CONFIRM_REMOVE_SERVER: Do you really want to remove this server?
ADD_ACCESS_KEY_SUBTITLE: Copy and paste an server key to add a server.
VPNHOOD_CONNECT_PRIVACY_POLICY_DESC:
Welcome to VpnHood! Connect, Your privacy is of utmost importance to us. Before you proceed, we strongly encourage you to take a few moments to read through our Privacy Policy. This policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use this information, and the measures we take to safeguard your data.

Understanding our Privacy Policy will help you make informed decisions about your use of our app. If you have any questions or concerns about our policy, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

Once you’ve read and understood our Privacy Policy, please click on the ‘Accept and Continue’ button to proceed with using our app. By clicking ‘Accept and Continue’, you acknowledge that you accept the terms outlined in our Privacy Policy.
PROTOCOL_DESC: UDP is much faster for apps that heavily use it, such as torrents, but it may not work with some firewalls and proxies. If you disable UDP, all apps still work, but they may get much slower.
NEW_SERVER_ADDED: A new server has been added.
EXCLUDE_LOCAL_NETWORK_DESC: Do not send my local network packets to VPN servers. I need to access the other computers and devices on my local network.
TUNNEL_MY_COUNTRY_DESC: Do you want to tunnel traffic hosted in your country?
SESSION_SUPPRESSED_TO_OTHER: You disconnected another device because you used the same server key on multiple devices!
SESSION_SUPPRESSED_BY_OTHER: You have been disconnected because another device connected with your server key!
VERSION_IS_DEPRECATED: Your VpnHood app is deprecated and will stop working sooner or later! Consider upgrading as soon as possible.
VERSION_IS_OLD: There is a new version available to install.
DO_NOT_HAVE_ACCESS_TO_GOOGLE_PLAY: Don't have access to Google Play?
UPDATE_FROM_ALTERNATIVE_LINK_NOTICE: Use only if you do not have access to Google Play
APP_FILTER_DISCONNECTING_NOTE: Note: You will be disconnected immediately to apply the changes
LOAD_APP_ERROR_DESC: There was a problem running the App
NO_SERVER_AVAILABLE: Currently, there are no servers available. Please add a server by clicking on the "Add Server" button.
AUTHENTICATION_ERROR: There is an error with your account, please sign in again
BUNDLE_SERVERS_SUBTITLE: Remove Ads + Hidden and Global servers
HIDDEN_SERVER_NOTICE: You can connect to a server whose IP address is available only to a limit group of users and which does not display ads. This reduces the likelihood of being blocked if you do not have access to global servers.
BUNDLE_SERVERS_NOTICE: Remove ads from the global servers, and gain access to a hidden server as well.
EMPTY_DEFAULT_CLIENT_PROFILE: Could not find default client profile id.
UDP_NOT_SUPPORTED_MESSAGE: This server does not support the UDP protocol.
PURCHASE_AND_PROCESS_IS_COMPLETE_MESSAGE: Your order has been processed and your subscription has been activated.
WAITING_TO_COMPLETE_ORDER_PROCESS: Please wait to complete order process...
CONFIRM_SIGN_OUT_DESC: Are you sure to sign out of your account?
COULD_NOT_FOUND_PUBLIC_SERVER_PROFILE: Could not found public server profile.
CONTRIBUTE_EDIT_LANGUAGES_DESC: If you see a problem with the translation or have a suggestion, please let us know through the link below.
MIGRATION_TITLE: Migration of the VpnHood public servers
MIGRATION_DESC:
Dear VpnHood User,

We're excited to announce that our free public servers are getting an upgrade! To provide you with a better, more robust VPN experience, we're transitioning our free services from VpnHood to a new, dedicated app: "VpnHood! Connect".

What's New?

  • Enhanced Performance: Enjoy faster, more reliable connections.
  • Streamlined Access: Easier navigation and user interface.
  • Ad-Supported Service: To keep your VPN service free, VpnHood Connect will feature occasional ads, ensuring we can continue offering top-notch security without a price tag.

What Do I Need to Do?

Download VpnHood! Connect from Google Play.

Who is not affected?

Users who do not use VpnHood Public Servers do not need to take any additional action; VpnHood will continue to operate as it did previously.

We understand changes can be inconvenient, but we're here to make this transition as smooth as possible. Our support team is standing by for any questions or assistance you may need.

Thank you for your trust in VpnHood. We look forward to continuing to protect your online privacy and security with VpnHood Connect.

Warm regards,
VpnHood
